New Records: Rishad Hossain's match-defining spell of 3/33 guides Bangladesh to a crucial victory against the Netherlands
Key Match Events: In for a riveting contest: Netherlands need 86 runs to win from the last 10 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan wins the Aramco POTM award for his fantastic innings of 64 not out
Miscellaneous Highlights: Group stage exit for Sri Lanka in 2024 T20 World Cup
Pakistan Cricket Team depending on QUDRAT KA NIZAAM and famously called as the UNPREDICTABLES is no more funny but a moment of embarrassment in the life of Pakistani fans now!
